Constructor Detail

DoubleRangeValidator

public DoubleRangeValidator(java.lang.String errorMessage,
                            java.lang.Double minValue,
                            java.lang.Double maxValue)
Creates a validator for checking that an Double is within a given range. By default the range is inclusive i.e. both minValue and maxValue are valid values. Use RangeValidator.setMinValueIncluded(boolean) or RangeValidator.setMaxValueIncluded(boolean) to change it.

Parameters:
errorMessage - the message to display in case the value does not validate.
minValue - The minimum value to accept or null for no limit
maxValue - The maximum value to accept or null for no limit
